mapper.insert: insert into suggestboard (seq, id, category, subject, content, imgName, logtimeQ) values (seq_suggestBoard.nextVal, #{id}, #{category}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{imgName}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, temp.* from (select * from suggestboard order by seq desc) temp) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
